mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER( MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_PHONE1, MEMBER_PHONE2, MEMBER_ADDR1, MEMBER_ADDR2) VALUES( #{member_id}, #{member_name}, #{member_gender}, #{member_email}, TO_DATE(#{member_birth},'YYYYMMDD'), #{member_phone1}, #{member_phone2}, #{member_addr1}, #{member_addr2})
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_GRADE, MEMBER_ADDR1, MEMBER_POINT, MEMBER_PHONE1 , MEMBER_REG FROM MEMBER
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_NAME = #{member_name}, MEMBER_GENDER = #{member_gender}, MEMBER_BIRTH = #{member_birth}, MEMBER_EMAIL = #{member_email}, MEMBER_PHONE1 = #{member_phone1}, MEMBER_PHONE2 = #{member_phone2}, MEMBER_ADDR1 = #{member_addr1}, MEMBER_ADDR2 = #{member_addr2} WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{member_id}
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PHONE1, MEMBER_PHONE2, MEMBER_ADDR1, MEMBER_ADDR2, MEMBER_GRADE, MEMBER_POINT, MEMBER_REG FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{member_id}
